# ScaleBio run on rat brain tissues from social isolation study
Lin Yang

## Project description
3 replicates for female and male rat treated with social isolation and social grouped respectively are included in the experiment. The treatment was exerted from P41-P55. Then, orbitofrontal cortex are dissected from frozen brain tissues and Hang did the nuclei preparation with ScaleBio RNA-seq kit.

A relavant presentation for this project is available at: [presentation](https://uchicago.box.com/s/o20tc5qjuk0ekn20dbln4atk9shx8sb1)
